Interface ISysGlobal

All Known Subinterfaces:
ISysLogConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
ASysBus, ASysLogger, ASysService, CSysCheckerByLevelCombination, CSysCheckerByLevelRange, CSysLog, CSysLogConstantsConverter
public interface ISysGlobal

Here the '-D' parameters are defined.

Version:
$Revision: 1.16 $
Author:
Torsten Knauft

Field Summary
static String CONFIG_CLASS
          The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the config class.
static String KEY_CLASS_NAME
          The key value that is used to read in the configuration for the class name.
static String KEY_NAME
          The key value that is used to read in the configuration for the internal name.
static String MESSAGE_CLASS
          The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the message class.
static String MESSAGE_VFEI_USE_STANDARD
          The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the message class.
static String SECTION_PROPERTIES
          The name of a component properties list, sought by the factory at startup to load configurable properties into the component instance.
static String TABLE_CLASS
          The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the table class.
 

Field Detail

CONFIG_CLASS

public static final String CONFIG_CLASS
The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the config class. The value is 'systemagmbh.config.class'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MESSAGE_CLASS

public static final String MESSAGE_CLASS
The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the message class. The value is 'systemagmbh.message.class'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MESSAGE_VFEI_USE_STANDARD

public static final String MESSAGE_VFEI_USE_STANDARD
The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the message class. The value is 'systemagmbh.message.class'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TABLE_CLASS

public static final String TABLE_CLASS
The value in the system properties that has to be used for setting the table class. The value is 'systemagmbh.table.class'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

KEY_CLASS_NAME

public static final String KEY_CLASS_NAME
The key value that is used to read in the configuration for the class name. The value is 'class'

See Also:
Constant Field Values

KEY_NAME

public static final String KEY_NAME
The key value that is used to read in the configuration for the internal name. The value is 'name'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SECTION_PROPERTIES

public static final String SECTION_PROPERTIES
The name of a component properties list, sought by the factory at startup to load configurable properties into the component instance.

See Also:
